name: FOOTBALL HERO - ALPHA
description:
The concept for this game was created during the B&W game jam.  After some great feedback I am trying to develop this demo with a possible release on steam in mind.  

Move your player with arrow keys  or wasd

Press space bar to start creating a path for your player or to cancel laying a path

Once a path is a complete loop, a team member will travel that path and attempt to kick the ball every time the ball enters his circle of vision.

Aside from placing your team member you need to hunt upgrades to improve your team mates speed, skill and vision.

Have fun and good luck
